page.title: 16SUGGESTED AREA IMPROVEMENTS
page.content: 1.SHOPS These are a vital aspect of our lifeand the area,being so rural,is not well served but at least it is near to the shopping centres of Chichester,Havant and Portsmouth. Residents would particularly like to see a Baker's shop,a Butcher's shop and a clothes shop opened. 2.TRAVEL People were generally fairly satisfied with the train service but would like to see more buses. 3.PUBLIC SERVICES Surprisingly,many people claimed to be dissatisfied with local milk deliveries,street lighting, and didn't like gas or electricity meters. 4.LEISURE In the smaller villages, Hambrook and Woodmancote,people felt that their opportunities for leisure were non-existant.More youth and social clubs seem to be in demand.
